title: S5 Ep20: What can helicopter money do?
itunes:title: What can helicopter money do?
description: If you're going to drop lots of money from a helicopter, what will happen to the economy? When would it make a difference, and to who? Helicopter money is increasingly being taken seriously as policy. Ricardo Reis tells Tim Phillips whether helicopter money really can solve our economic problems.
itunes:author: VoxTalks
dc:creator: VoxTalks
